texts.es: La cliente Miriam, es una señora de 30 años de edad, la cliente tiene 2 hijos que dependen de ella, el padre los abandono hace mucho tiempo atrás, cuando los niños eran muy pequeños, y desde entonces la cliente se dedicó al cuidado de sus hijos, dándoles cariño, amor, la educación y sobre todo la alimentación de sus hijos, actualmente la cliente se dedica a vender comida de refrigerio por las calles de la ciudad de Cochabamba, el destino del crédito es para incrementar su venta de comida en las calles de la ciudad, y así poder aumentar la fuente de sus ingresos,  y  poder cubrir la educación de sus hijos, que es lo que más le importa a nuestra cliente, ella vive con sus 2 hijos en un pequeño cuarto, que queda ubicado en la zona la Chimba, zona oeste de la ciudad de Cochabamba, es por lo cual reflejamos esta pequeña historia de la cliente, para el conocimiento de todos ustedes.
texts.en: Miriam is a 30 year old woman with 2 children who depend on her.  Their father abandoned them long ago, when the children were very small, and since then Miriam is dedicated to the care of her children, giving them love, education and food. She now sells snack food on the streets of the city of Cochabamba.  This loan is to increase food sales in the city streets so that she can increase her income and to cover the education of her children, which is what matters most to her.  She lives with her 2 children in a small room, located in Chimba area, west of the city of Cochabamba, which is why we reflect this little story of the client, to the knowledge of all of you.

loans.use: with operating capital for her business.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Rosa, vive en casa familiar, con sus papas y hermanos, esta soltera, ella atiende un negocio donde ofrece pan, atol, y venta de cosméticos, este negocio lo inicio a través de su madre, desde hace 5 años.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de pan dulce, maíz, harina de arroz, azúcar, y cosméticos, con esta inversión estará abasteciendo a todo lo que ofrece, comprando los ingredientes para los atoles, pan y cosméticos, para fortalecer de variedad. 
Sus aspiraciones con respecto al prestamos es seguir fortaleciéndolo, que su familia cuente con su apoyo para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Rosa, who lives in her family's home with her parents and siblings, is single.  She runs a business where she sells bread, "atol" [a warm drink made of corn], and she sells cosmetics.  She began this business through her mother 5 years ago.
She is asking for a loan to buy pastries, corn, rice flour, sugar, and cosmetics.  With this investment, she will be stocking up on everything that she sells, buying the ingredients for the "atoles", bread, and cosmetics to increase variety.
Her aspirations, with respect to the loans, is to continue growing stronger, so that her family can count on her support to move ahead.

loans.use: buy pastries, corn, rice flour, sugar, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Nozim

texts.ru: Нозим женат и любящий отец одного ребенка. Он очень трудолюбивый человек. Более 18 лет он занимается покраской  и ремонтом автомашин в автосервисе. Он также является жестянщиком. Нозим очень старательный человек и любит свой бизнес. Нозим хочет содержать свою семью в хороших условиях жизни и старается обеспечить их всем. Нозим запрашивает займ в размере 3000$ США для покупки разных цветов красок, используемых для покраски автомашин.
texts.en: Nozim is married and is a loving father of one child. He is a very hardworking man. He has been doing paint jobs and repairing cars in the body shop for more than eighteen years. He is also a tinsmith. Nozim is a very diligent man and loves his business. Nozim wants to provide good living conditions for his family and tries to provide everything for them. He is asking for a loan in the amount of $3,000 USD to buy different colors of auto paint for use on the cars.

loans.use: to buy auto paint.

loans.name: Amon

texts.ru: Амон житель района Восеъ. Ему 56 лет. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Он предоставляет услугу, такси. В этой области он пять лет. Кроме того Амон у себя дома разводит крупнорогатый скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Этим видом деятельности он занимается три года. Кредит берет для ремонта машины и закупа телят.
texts.en: Amon is a resident of the Vose region. He is 56 years old and has four children. He provides a taxi service and has been in this field for five years. Besides this Amon also breeds large horned cattle at his home for future resale. He has been in this business for three years. He is taking out the loan to repair the car and buy calves.

loans.use: to repair the car and buy calves.

loans.name: Teresa Margarita

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Mujeres Organizadas. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

En este lugar vive la señora Teresa, tiene 55 años de edad, hace varios años su esposo falleció pero de esta relación tuvo dos hijos los mismos que ya son mayores de edad, tiene a su cargo a un nieto de 17 años  que es como su hijo y estudia en colegio.

Ella es una mujer muy luchadora que para salir adelante sola continuó con el negocio que desde hace muchos años tenían su esposo, es una pequeña fábrica donde fabrica y vende chifles,  trabaja todos los días  desde las 6h00 de la mañana  en la fabricación de los chifles con la ayuda de dos personas más  a quienes les paga un sueldo semanal y luego con la ayuda de su nieto se encarga de entregar a cevicherías y tiendas de la localidad. También prepara  comida pero esto lo realiza en las tardes y noches ya que solo prepara meriendas.
 
Este crédito es para comprar plátanos, aceite, arroz, carne  y otros viveres para la fabricación de los chifles y los alimentos. Es socia fundadora del Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los intereses son muy bajos y por la ayuda que recibe con los créditos.
  
Sus sueños son tener una microempresa con maquinarias y un camión para ir a entregar a otros lugares.
texts.en:
In the town of Rocafuerte, every two weeks the members of the Communal Bank "Organized Women" gets together.  This place is known for its delicious sweets that the locals prepare and that are recognized throughout the country.

Teresa, who is 55 years old, lives in this place.  Several years ago, her husband passed away, but she had two children from that relationship.  They are now older in age.  She has a 17-year-old grandson in her care who is like her son.  He studies at the high school.

She is a very hard-fighting woman, who in order to get ahead, continued on her own with the business that her husband had for many years.  It is a small factory where she makes and sells snacks.  She works every day from 6 in the morning making snacks with the help of two other people who she pays a weekly salary and later with the help of her grandson.  She makes sure to deliver to diners and stores in the area.  Also, she prepares food, but she does this in the afternoons and evenings since she only prepares snacks.

This loan is for the purchase of plantains, oil, rice, meat, and other supplies for making snacks and other foods.  She is a founding member of the Communal Bank, and she likes it because the interest rates are very low and because of the help that she receives with the loans.

Her dreams are to to have a small business with machines and a truck to deliver to other places.

loans.use: buy plantains, oil, rice, meat, and other supplies.

loans.name: Mitsubishi Group

texts.en:
Ester is in her late forties and is married with four children who are still going to school.  She has been selling soft drinks and snacks for 10 years now. She works from 6am to 10pm and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Ester’s second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan to increase the soft drinks, household expenses, paid school fees and has paid back her loan successfully. She hopes for a loan to buy more soft drinks to sell. Her dream is to build her own house.

Ester will share this loan with her loan group, "Mitsubishi", which has a total of 15 members.  The members of the group will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

loans.use: to buy more soft drinks to sell.

loans.name: Sylvia

texts.en:
Sylvia is 41 years old, married, and has one child in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur.

Sylvia has a variety store business in the Philippines. Sylvia requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more goods like canned goods, detergent and other groceries.

Sylvia has been in this business for five years.  In the future, Sylvia would like to save enough money so she can continue to send her child to college and improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more goods like canned goods, detergent and other groceries.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es:
Nelly es una madre de familia soltera de 31 años de edad con 1 hijo, actualmente esta viviendo en casa de sus padres en el caserío rural de nombre San “Alfredo Vilca Aguilar”  a unos 10 minutos del Distrito de Tambogrande, el cual es perteneciente a la provincia de Piura, la misma que esta ubicada a unas 3 horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, por ser una zona rural en la que vive Nelly aun no cuenta con el servicio básico de agua potable contando por ahora solo con el servicio de luz.

Nelly con la ayuda de sus padres logró terminar la carrera técnica de enfermería, ahora en la casa donde vive ah acondicionado un lugar donde realiza de lunes a domingo consultas médicas y a la vez ha puesto en venta medicinas (farmacia) las cuales son mas comunes o mas solicitadas por los pobladores donde ella vive, y es que la labor que realiza es muy importante en la zona debido a que no es fácil encontrar un medico o lugares donde vendan medicinas de primeros auxilios.

Nelly desea implementar su negocio tanto en la venta de medicinas como en infraestructura para su consultorio por lo que le hace falta capital y por eso que solicita un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 1500 Nuevos Soles con lo que podrá cumplir son objetivos.

Nelly es joven y profesional gracias a al ayuda de su padres por lo que esta interesada en retribuir su esfuerzo trabajando ella responsablemente y así mejorar la calidad de vida no solamente de sus padres si no que también la de su hijo.
texts.en:
Nelly is 31, and a single parent with one child. Currently she is living in her parents' home in the rural settlement of San Alfredo Vilca Aguilar, some ten minutes from Tambogrande, which is part of Piura province, which is located some three hours from the city of Chiclayo. Because Nelly lives in a rural area, she still does not have basic potable water service, and for now only has electricity.

With her parents' help, Nelly succeeded in completing a technical degree in nursing. Now in the house where she lives she has set up a place, where from Monday to Sunday, she does medical consultations, and at the same time sells medicines (pharmacy) which are the most commonly used, or most requested by the local people. 

The work she does is very important in the area, due to the fact that it is not easy to find a doctor or places where they sell medicines used in primary care.

Nelly wishes to establish her business both in the sale of medicines, and in infrastructure for her clinic, so she needs working capital. That is why she is applying to Edpyme for a loan in the amount of 1,500 nuevos soles, with which she will be able to meet her objectives. 

Nelly is a young professional thanks to her parents' help, so she is interested in paying back their efforts by working responsibly, and so improving not only her parents' quality of life, but also that of her child.

loans.use: To buy medicines and construction materials.

loans.name: Batirhan

texts.en:
Batirhan is 54 years old and lives with his wife and two kids in a ger (Mongolian yurt) in Bayan-Ulgii province in western Mongolia. His wife helps with his business, and his older child is a college student and the younger one is a school student. 

He started his garment retailing business in 1998 by renting a counter in the market. Over the years, he gained many customers and his garments are high quality and fashionable. Mostly, his wife sits at the counter and he drives a taxi as a second income source. He is a sharp and hard-working man who says "Now that my daughter is a college student, I should work even harder." He is requesting 2,800,000 MNT to buy more clothes from Erlian for a holiday season in Mongolia.

loans.use: To buy more clothes from Erlian

loans.name: Jose Andres

texts.es:
Don Jose, continua con su negocio, de acarreo y venta de leche agria, en donde cada dia, se esmera para captar clientes, siendo la competencia fuerte, para el la mejora  a su casa ha sido una pioridad, el cual ya lo esta logrando, levanto una parte de concreto ya, y tiene materiales de construccion para continuar.
En donde con este nuevo prestamo, podra comprar mas material, en bloque, cemento, hierro y lograr abanzar mas con su casa, dando un techo mas seguro y digno a su familia.
texts.en:
José continues with his transportation business and selling buttermilk, where every day he puts a lot of effort into attracting customers because of the strong competition.  Improving his house has been a priority for him, and he is achieving it.  He already built one part of concrete and he has construction materials to continue.

With this new loan he will be able to buy more materials such as cinderblocks, cement, and metal, and manage to advance more on the house, giving his family a secure home and dignity.

loans.use: to build his house in concrete, making improvements in security and hygiene.

loans.name: Farhod

texts.ru: Фарход добрый и трудолюбивый семьянин. Жена работает семейным врачом в поликлинике. Фарход занимается предоставлением услуг такси. Фарход хочет содержать свою семью в хороших условиях и хочет улучшить свои жилищные условия. Фарход запрашивает займ для покупки цемента, песка, гравия и шифера для постройки дома. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Farhod is a kind and hard-working family man. His wife works as a family doctor at a clinic, while Farhod offers taxi services. He would like to keep his family comfortable and improve their living conditions. Farhod is requesting a loan to purchase cement, sand, gravel and slate for the construction of his new home. He is hoping for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, gravel and slate for building his new house

loans.name: La Florida (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal La Florida formado por 6 socias y 2 socios quienes laboran en diferentes actividades,  las mismas que le permiten solventar los gastos de sus hogares. Viven en la ciudad de Cuenca capital de la provincia del Azuay,  es reconocida como la "Atenas del Ecuador", es la ciudad cultural del país y fue declarada en Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, su gente  en su mayoría se dedica a la producción artesanal y mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Janneth, tiene 21 años de edad, casada  y tiene una hija de 2 años de edad, su esposo es de profesión chofer y labora prestando sus servicios en una empresa como chofer particular, la casa en la que viven es de su propiedad.
 
Ella  hace 4 meses inicio su propio negocio, tiene una tienda de comestibles en la cual trabaja de domingo a domingo desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche.
 
Este es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal al cual fue invitada por su mamá quien es socia activa, su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de víveres para surtir su tienda.
 
Su meta es ampliar su negocio.

La señora que está con sombrero en la foto es madre de una de las socias, no es integrante de este grupo.
texts.en:
The communal bank "La Florida" is made up of 6 women and 2 men, each of whom has their own business.  The members of this group have been able to cover their household expenses through the money earned by these businesses.  They live in the city of Cuenca, the capital of Azuay province, which is known as the "Athens of Ecuador."  This is culturally one of the most important cities in the country, and in December of 1999 it was named a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Many of the people in this city work in handicrafts, and they maintain the culture and traditions of their towns.

One of the members of this group is Janneth.  She is 21 years old, married, and has a 2 year-old daughter.  Her husband is a professional driver, and he works for a company providing private driver services.  They live in their own home.

Janneth started her own business 4 months ago; she has a grocery store where she works every day from 6am until 10 at night.

This is the first loan that she has taken in her communal bank.  She was invited to join the group by her mother, who is an active member.  She will invest this loan in the purchase of grocery products for her store.

Her goal is to expand her business.

The woman in photograph who is wearing a hat is the mother of one of the members; she is not a member of this group.

loans.use: to buy groceries

loans.name: Rahmatullo

texts.ru: Рахматулло женат, имеет четверых детей. Он очень трудолюбивый человек и любит работать в сфере агробизнеса. Более 3 лет он занимается купле- продажей крупного рогатого скота. Начал свой бизнес с продажи мелкого рогатого скота. В бизнесе помогает сын. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Рахматулло хотел бы получить займ в размере 3500 Сомони для покупки скота с целью расширения бизнеса и увлечения поголовье скота.
texts.en: Rahmatullo is married and has four children. He is a very hard-working person and loves being engaged in agriculture. For over 3 years he has been buying and selling cattle, a business he started by selling smaller livestock. Rahmatullo's son helps with the business, while his wife takes care of the household. Rahmatullo would like to obtain a loan of 3500 somoni to purchase cattle in order to expand his business and increase the size of his herd.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Dilafruz

texts.ru: Дилафруз проживает в районе Дж. Руми. Ей 25 лет. Она замужем. У нее двое детей. Она занимается торговлей. Дилафруз арендует торговую точку на рынке, где продает конфеты, шоколад, печенья и хлопковое мала. Этим видом деятельности она занимается три года. Кредит берет для покупки продуктов.
texts.en: Dilafruz lives in the J. Rumy region. She is 25 years old, married, and has two children. Dilafruz is engaged in trade - she rents space at a market, where she sells candy, chocolate, biscuits and cottonseed oil. She has been doing this for three years. Dilafruz is taking this loan to stock up on products.

loans.use: to purchase products for her store

loans.name: Arminda

texts.es: Arminda, de 62 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de ser alegre y social. Está casada con Pablo quien es comerciante y padre de sus dos hijas. Juntos habitan cómodamente en su casa propia, en compañía de su yerno y sus 03 nietos. La actividad que realiza Arminda es el alquiler de cuartos para solteros, negocio que lo tiene habilitado en su propia casa, ahí cuenta con 10 ambientes brindando comodidad y limpieza, por lo que ha logrado ganarse la preferencia de sus clientes. Tiene más de 03 años dedicándose  a éste negocio y cuenta con el apoyo de su pareja quien le busca nuevos inquilinos. Le gusta su negocio pues le genera un ingreso económico y le permite sentirse una persona productiva. Además considera su negocio bastante rentable por la demanda que tiene y las ganancias que le deja. Por tanto tiene planes de ampliar y construir más cuartos par así aumentar sus ingresos económicos. Este será el préstamo número 03 con la institución MFP. Está muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Con el monto solicitado de 2000 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de materiales como maderas y listones para ampliar y construir más cuartos.
texts.en:
Arminda is 62, and a hard-working, determined woman, besides being cheerful and out-going. She is married to Pablo, who is a merchant, and father of their two children. They live together comfortably in their own home, along with their son-in-law and their three grandchildren.

Arminda rents rooms for single people, a business she has set up in her own home. There she has ten rooms offering comfort and cleanliness, so she has managed to win the preference of her customers. She has been working at her business for more than three years, and has the support of her partner, who finds new tenants for her. 

She likes her business because it generates an income, and allows her to feel productive. In addition, she considers her business quite profitable because of the demand that it has and the earnings it provides.  

Therefore she has plans to expand, and build more rooms, so as to increase her income. This will be her third loan with the MFP institution. She is very happy to know that she will have financial support, as in this way she will feel confident in moving forward with her business. 

With the amount of 2,000 nuevos soles applied for, she will purchase materials such as wood and wood strips for expanding and constructing more rooms.

loans.use: To buy wood and wood strips for fitting out more rooms.

loans.name: Verita

texts.es:
Verita, de 40 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y decidida a salir adelante. Convive con Walter quien se dedica a la mecánica de motos y es el padre de sus dos hijos de 18 y 12 años de edad. Juntos viven en su propia casa en compañía de su madre.
La actividad que realiza Verita es la costura y confección de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, para ello posee un pequeño taller que instaló en su casa, donde tiene 03 máquinas de coser semi industrial que le sirven para realizar buenos acabados y al gusto de sus clientes logrando ganarse la preferencia de ellos. Tiene más de 10 años realizando ésta actividad y en un principio lo hacía sola, pero ahora contrata una señora que la ayuda en la costura y le paga por trabajo entregado.
Le gusta la costura, pues lo aprendió estudiando en un centro de educación ocupacional, y hasta el momento le ha servido como fuente de ingreso económico, y eso le hace sentirse una persona productiva. Considera su negocio bastante rentable por las buenas ganancias que le deja. Por eso tiene planes de abrir una tienda de venta de ropa en su propia casa, donde pueda exhibir sus creaciones.Este será el préstamo número 10 con la institución MFP. Está muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores crédito que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas que son responsables y muy solidarias.
Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de materiales de costura como telas, hilos, elásticos y otros, buscando a precios más cómodo por sus compras en volumen.
texts.en:
40-year-old Verita is a hard-working woman who is determined to get ahead in life.  She lives with Walter who is a motorcycle mechanic and also the father of her two children who are 18 and 12 years old.  They live in their own home together with Verita's mother.

Verita's business is sewing and making ladies', men's and children's clothing.  She has a small workshop that she set up in her home.  She has three semi-industrial machines that she uses to provide a good finish to her products, making them to her customers' tastes.  This makes her loyal customers.  Verita has been in this business for more than 10 years.  At first she worked alone but now she hires a lady who helps her with her sewing and she pays her for each piece of work she does.

Verita likes sewing which is a skill she learned at an occupational education center.  Up to now it has served her well as a source of income.  This makes her feel like a productive person.  She considers her business to be fairly profitable as it makes her good profits.  For this reason, she has plans to open a clothes store in her own home where she will display her creations.

This will be Verita's tenth loan from MFP.  She is happy to know that she will have financial support as it makes her feel certain that she will make progress in her work.  For her part, she pledges once again to make her repayments on time as she did with her previous loans.  Verita enjoys belonging to her community bank because all the members are responsible and very supportive people.  She will invest her 1,000 soles in buying sewing supplies such as fabric, thread, elastic, etc.  She will seek out better prices as she will be buying in bulk.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread and elastic

loans.name: Eileen

texts.es:
Eileen, de 22 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, con muchas ganas de progresar. Está casada con Fernando quien es empleado y padre de su hija de 01 año de edad. Juntos habitan en la casa de sus suegros, en compañía de los padres de su esposo. La actividad que realiza Eileen es la venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños. Todos estos productos se los compra y envía su prima que vive en la ciudad de Lima y son vendidos entre sus familiares, amistades y vecinos, a quienes atiende de manera cordial y amable, logrando ganarse su preferencia. De esa manera la recomiendan con otras personas, que al cabo de un tiempo se vuelven también sus  clientes habituales. Tiene más de 2 años dedicándose a éste negocio y hasta el momento tiene el apoyo de su mamá quien le ayuda consiguiéndole más clientes.
 Le gusta su negocio ya que le genera ingresos económicos.  Por otro lado tiene planes de planes de incursionar en otro negocio como la venta de repuestos para motos. Este será el préstamo número 05 con la institución MFP. Está muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado se siente a gusto con su banco comunal, pues  considera un grupo unido y solidario. Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de más mercaderías como ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, así como sandalias.
texts.en:
Eileen, 22, is a hardworking and dedicated woman who has a strong desire to make progress in her life.  She is married to Fernando, who is employed and is the father of her 1 year-old daughter.  They live together with her husband's parents in his parents' home.  Eileen has a business selling clothing for women, men and children.  All of these products are bought and sent to her by her cousin, who lives in the city of Lima.  She sells them to her relatives, friends and neighbors, to whom she provides friendly and cordial service so that they will prefer her business.  In this way, they will recommend her to other people, who over time will also become her regular customers.  Eileen has been doing this work for more than 2 years, and up until now she has had the support of her mother, who helps her to get more customers.

Eileen enjoys her business, since it generates a good income for her.  Furthermore, she has plans to venture into another business selling spare parts for motorcycles.  This will be her 5th loan with the MFP institution. She is very content to know that she will have financial support, because in this way she feels more certain that she will be able to make progress with her business.  In addition, she feels very comfortable with her communal bank, as she considers it to be a very supportive and united group.  With the sum of 1,500 Peruvian soles requested, she will invest in her business by purchasing more merchandise in the form of clothing for men, women and children, and sandals.

loans.use: to buy clothing for women, men and children

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: Martha, de 48 años de edad, es una mujer alegre y amable, además de ser trabajadora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Está casada con Jesús quien se dedica al transporte y es padre de su hija de 15 años de edad. Juntos habitan en su propia casa en compañía de su padre. La actividad que tiene Martha es la venta de bebida gaseosa de diferentes marcas y sabores, además de golosinas. Todos estos productos son adquiridos al contando y son vendidos desde su casa a sus vecinos y transeúntes quienes son sus clientes habituales. Tiene más de 6 años dedicándose  éste negocio y por el momento solo cuenta con el apoyo de su hija quien atiende a los clientes cuando ella está fuera de casa.  Le gusta su negocio por los ingresos económicos y el poder tener una ocupación, además de estar en la comodidad de su casa y contar con tiempo disponible para dedicarlo a su familia. Considera su negocio rentable por la demanda que tiene y las ganancias que le deja. Por tanto tiene planes de ampliar su negocio e incursionar en la venta de comida rápida. Este será el préstamo número 05 con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado, comenta sentirse bien con su banco comunal pues le gusta el trabajo que vienen realizando apoyándose entre ellos. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería para surtir su bodega como accesorios para damas y relojes.
texts.en:
Martha Is 48, and a cheerful, friendly woman, besides being hard-working and eager to get ahead in life. She is married to Jesús, who works in transportation and is the father of their 15-year-old daughter. They live together in their own house, along with her father.

Martha sells soft drinks of various brands and flavors, and also candy. All these products are acquired for cash, and sold from her home to neighbors and passersby, who are her regular customers. She has been working in this business for more than six years, and at the moment she only has the help of her daughter, who serves customers when she is away from the house. 

She likes her business for the income; and because it enables her to have an occupation, and also be in the comfort of her home and have time available to devote to her family.

She considers her business profitable because of the demand she has and the earnings it provides her. Therefore she has plans to expand her business, and get into the sale of fast food.

This will be her fifth loan with the MFP institution, so she is hoping for a small loan so that she can meet her objectives. Moreover, she says that she feels good about her communal bank, as she likes the work that have been doing to support one another. 

With the amount of 1,000 soles applied for, she will invest in the purchase of merchandise such as ladies' accessories and watches, for supplying her small general store.

loans.use: To buy more drinks and ladies' accessories.

loans.name: Noelali

texts.es:
Noelali, de 47 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa. Está separada del padre de su hijo. Ella y su hijo habitan una casa alquilada en compañía además de su nuera y una sobrina. La actividad que realiza Noelali es la venta de bebidas gaseosas, para eso cuenta con una congeladora grande que compró con el apoyo del padre de su hijo. Ahí es donde guardan sus bebidas atendiendo muy amablemente a sus clientes ganándose así la preferencia de ellos. Tiene más de 20 años dedicándose a este negocio y hasta el momento lo realiza sola.
Le gusta su negocio pues le genera ingresos económicos que le permite sentirse ocupada contando con un oficio. Considera su negocio rentable por la demanda que tiene y las ganancias que le deja. Por tanto tiene planes de seguir con su negocio y hacerlo crecer, Por otro lado desea incursionar en otro negocio como es la venta de jugo de frutas por las mañanas, así logrará  generarse más ingresos económicos. Este será el préstamo número 06 con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado, le gusta el trabajo que viene realizando en su banco comunal apoyando a las personas en avanzar con sus negocios. Con el monto solicitado de 500 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de más gaseosas de diversa marcas y sabores para tener un stock surtido y disponible para la venta buscando precios más bajos por su compra en volumen.
texts.en:
Noelali, 47, is a hardworking woman. She is separated from her son's father. She and her son live in a rented home together with her daughter-in-law and a niece. 

Noelali sells carbonated drinks and has a large freezer that she bought with the help of her son’s father. There she keeps her drinks while waiting pleasantly on her customers, her manner insuring that she is their preferred provider of soft drinks. She has had this business for 20 years and until now has run it alone.

She likes her business since it generates an income and enables her to keep busy and have a job. She considers her business to be profitable because of the demand and the profits she makes. Consequently she plans to continue with her business and make it grow. On the other hand, she also wants to venture into another business such as the sale of fruit juice in the mornings and thus generate more income. 

This will be her sixth loan with MFP and she hopes for your collaboration so she can continue to meet her goals. She enjoys the work she is engaged in with her communal bank helping people succeed in their businesses. With the sum of 500 nuevos soles requested, she will purchase more different brands and flavors of carbonated drinks so  her inventory will be well stocked and ready for sale. She will also look for lower prices due to buying in volume.

loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks.

loans.name: Andryusha

texts.ru:
Андрюша родился в 1962 году в деревне Чакатен, Сьюникского региона. После  окончания сельской средней школы Андрюша поступил в Ереванский Зооветеринарный институт, где он получил специальность животновода.  
Андрюша вдовец и у него есть 23-х летний сын и 18 летняя дочь. 
Начиная в 2000 года Андрюша занимается сельским хозяйством в деревне Чакатен, где он разводит крупный рогатый скот и кур, также он выращивает овощи, фрукты и ячмень на собственном участке земли. Также Андрюша арендует участок земли, на котором он выращивает пшеницу. 
У Андрюши есть небольшой магазин в городе Капане, в котором он продает мясо, яйца и молочные продукты со своей фермы, а также приобретенные у других фермеров. Выращенные овощи, фрукты и зерновые культуры Андрюша сбывает своим постоянным клиентам в городе Капане. 
Также недавно Андрюши приобрел трактор, благодаря которому он выполняет посевные работы на земельных участках Сьюникской области. Сын Андрюши помогает ему на ферме, а дочь занимается сельским хозяйством. 
Кредит на сумму 1.100.000 драм необходим Андрюше для покупки 20 поросят,  а также приобретения нового сорта ячменя для посева, дизельного топлива и удобрений. Данный кредит является третьим по счету, получаемым Андрюшей от организации Нор Оризон.
texts.en:
Andrusha was born in 1962 in the village of Chakaten in the Syuninsky region. After graduating from the village secondary school Andrusha enrolled in the Yerevan Veterenary Institue where he received a degree in animal husbandry.

Andrusha is a widower and has a 23 year old son and eighteen year old daughter. 

Starting in 2000 Andrusha has been doing farming in the village of Chakaten where he breeds large horned cattle and poultry and also grows vegetables, fruits and barley on his own plot of land. He also rents out a plot of land where he cultivates wheat.

Andrusha has a small store in the town of Kapan where he sells meat, eggs and dairy products from his farm as well as products purchased from other farmers. He sells his own grown vegetables, fruits and cereals to his regular customers in the town of Kapan.

Recently Andrusha has purchased a tractor with which he carries out sowing on the land plots of the Syuninsky region. His son helps him on the farm and his daughter is engaged in agriculture.

Andrusha needs a loan in the amount of 1,100,000 dram to buy twenty piglets as well as new type of barley for sowing, diesel fuel and fertilizer. This is a third loan which Andrusha is taking out with the organization Nor Horizon.

loans.use: to buy 20 piglets and also barley seedlings, diesel fuel and fertilizer for his farm.

loans.name: Debner

texts.es:
Debner, de 52 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador y empeñoso, además de ser amable y cordial. Convive con Daysi quien es ama de casa y madre de sus hijos. Juntos habitan en la casa de sus padres en compañía de su papá, hermana, dos sobrinos, y su abuela. La actividad que realiza Debner es el transporte, para eso cuenta con un mototaxi que compró con su propio capital hace 03 años, desde entonces viene realizando éste  oficio, recorriendo las calles de la ciudad de Pucallpa buscando a sus clientes llevándolos a su destino de manera segura. Le gusta su actividad pues le brinda los ingresos económicos y le permite tener un oficio, pues tenía buen tiempo sin conseguir un empleo. Considera su negocio bastante rentable por la demanda de transporte que hay  en la ciudad y eso le trae  buenas ganancias.  Por tanto tiene planes de ampliar su negocio y crecer, deseando comprarse otra unidad de transporte y así generarse más ingresos económicos. Este será el préstamo número 01 con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. 
Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de repuestos para el mantenimiento de su mototaxi, así como el pago del servicio a un mecánico.
texts.en:
Debner, 52, is a hardworking man, as well as being a cordial and friendly one. He lives with Daysi who is a housewife and the mother of his children. Together they live in his parent’s house with his father, sister, two nephews and his grandmother.

Debner is in transportation and has a motor taxi that he bought with his own capital three years ago. Since then he has been doing this work, traveling the streets of the city of Pucallpa, looking for clients and carrying them to their destination safely. He enjoys his work because it provides an income and enables him to have a job since he went a long time without a job formerly. He feels his business is sufficiently profitable because of the demand for transportation in the city and because he earns a good income. Consequently he plans to expand his business and hopes to buy another motor taxi and thus generate more income.

This will be his first loan with MFP and he hopes for your collaboration so that he can continue to meet his goals. With the 1,000 nuevos soles requested, he will buy spare parts for maintenance of his motor taxi and pay for the services of a mechanic.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and pay a mechanic.

loans.name: Sabina

texts.en:
Sabina is a 43-year-old lady from Migori town. She is married to Festo, and they have six children aged between 7 and 23 years.

Sabina operates a tailoring and dressmaking business, a business she has done for the last 12 years. From her business, she makes a monthly income of 15,000 Kenyan shillings (KES). She is a long-time client of KADET LTD since she is taking her sixth loan, which she will use to buy textile materials for dressmaking. She will then use the profits to repay the loan.

Her dream is to see her business grow larger than it is now.

loans.use: To buy textile materials for dressmaking.

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.en:
Jacinta is 28 years old. She is a mother of one child. She runs a retail shop to earn a living. She has been in the business for two years and has employed one person. 

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to save her income and hopes to expand her business in the future. She has applied for a 15,000 Kenya Shillings loan to buy sugar, maize flour and sodas.

loans.use: To buy sugar, maize flour and sodas.

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is a 38-year-old business lady. She is a single mother of one child. She has been selling building materials for the past three years with the monthly income of 15,000 Kenyan shillings (KES), which she uses to cater to her child’s basic needs. 

She is applying for her first loan from KADET LTD after being introduced by a KADET staff member. Janet will use the loan to buy stones and sand for selling. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her child. Her hopes and dreams are to buy a lorry (truck) for transporting the materials.

loans.use: To buy stones and sand for selling.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 50 years old and an enterprising businessman. He is married to Sicily, a business lady. They are blessed with four children. He has been running a bookshop for the past seven years with the monthly income of 10,000 Kenyan shillings, which he uses to support his family.

He is applying for his second loan from KADET LTD after repaying the previous loan successfully. Joseph will use the loan to buy more books for his shop. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to buy a piece of land and build rental houses.

loans.use: To buy more books for his shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy green vegetables and fruits for her business

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en: Teresa is 35 years old, married with three children. She runs a retail shop to earn a living. She has been in the business for six years and has employed one person. She also runs a salon to earn extra income. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to save her income and hopes to expand her business in the future. She has applied for 100,000 Kenya Shillings to buy five sacks of sugar, five sacks of rice, and soap to sell.

loans.use: To buy five sacks of sugar, five sacks of rice, and soap to sell

loans.name: Christin

texts.en:
Christin is 38 years old. She is a retail shop proprietor in Mariakani. She is a married mother of three. Her business has been in operation for the past one year and it is doing great. 

This is her first business loan from KADET LTD to finance her business. She plans to purchase more sugar, rice, cooking oil and washing detergents. 


She will use the anticipated profits to educate her children and repay her loan. She hopes to have a bigger, more profitable business.

loans.use: to purchase more sugar, rice, cooking oil and washing detergents.

loans.name: Them

texts.en:
Mrs. Them is 60 years old, a responsible mother who has tried hard to support her family, especially her two single children. She has spent most of her life dedicated to rice husbandry on a few plots of inherited farmland located in Kompong Cham province, Cambodia. Her husband is the one who completely helps in managing the process of farming year after year. 

Due to the lack of a vehicle for use, this family has met many difficulties. Therefore, Them would like to borrow some funds from HKL and Kiva to purchase a second-hand motorcycle for her daughter's commuting to her workplace as well as to use for the whole family. Using the loan from our lenders will help reduce some expenses of her family. Her future goal is to develop and expand her farming business.

loans.use: to purchase a second-hand motorcycle.

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en:
Rosemary is 50 years old, a business lady; she is married to Francis, a businessman. They are blessed with four children. She has been running a greengrocer business in an open-air market for the past ten years with the monthly income of KES 8,000 which she uses to support her family.


She is applying for her first loan from KADET LTD, after being introduced by an existing KADET customer.  Rosemary will use the loan to buy green vegetables and fruits for her business. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to distribute the greens to nearby schools and hospitals.

loans.use: to buy green vegetables and fruits for her business.

loans.name: Benson

texts.en:
Benson is 30 years old, single and owns a retail shop. He sells polythene bags and sweets, a business he ventured into five years ago. He earns a monthly income of KES 20,000 and has requested for a loan of KES 20,000 to buy more polythene and sweets for sale. 

The anticipated profit would help him repay his loan. His dream is to become a distributor one day. This is his second loan.

loans.use: To purchase more polythene and sweets for sale.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is 49 years old and a business lady; she is married to Wilson, a businessman. They are blessed with five children. She has been selling fruits for the past three years with the monthly income of KES 5,000 which she uses to support her family. 

She is applying for her first loan with KADET LTD, after being introduced by an existing KADET customer. Jane will use the loan to buy fresh fruits for her business. 

With the anticipated profit from the business she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to start a greengrocer business.

loans.use: to buy fresh fruits for  sale in  her business.

loans.name: Simeon

texts.en: Simeon is a businessman. He runs a barber shop to earn a living. He has been in the business for 10 years and has employed three people. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his living standards and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 60,000 Kenya Shillings to buy shaving machines and a washing sink.

loans.use: To buy  shaving machines and a washing sink

loans.name: 03.09.123 Thiệu Dương Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Khải operates a food stall selling fruit. She is requesting a loan to purchase fruit to resell.

Khải is 38 years old. She is married with two children. Khải is the group leader of the 03.09.123 Thiệu Dương solidarity group, which consists of four members.  Khải lives in Thieu Hoa district with one dependent. 


This is Khải's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Khải has been involved in this business for eight years. The main hardship that Khải faces in her business is the lack of capital.

Khải hopes for her business to do well, to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase fruit to resell

loans.name: Sun

texts.en:
Mrs. Sun has owned and managed her rice farming business for almost 21 years. She has been married for long time but unfortunately she doesn’t have any children yet. She manages her business happily because her husband is supportive in the maintenance of their rice field. 

Mrs. Sun’s present house is under construction and she used her savings to pay for it. Due to the financial difficulty they are experiencing nowadays, Mrs. Sun would like to request a loan in the amount of KHR 1,000,000 to pay for the construction fee. In coming years, Mrs. Sun hopes that her dreams will be attained in order to sustain her family's needs.

loans.use: to pay for the construction fee.

loans.name: Hannah

texts.en:
Hannah is 49 years old and a business lady. She is a single mother of three children aged 20, 18 and 15 years. She has been running a greengrocer business in an open-air market for the past ten years with the monthly income of KES 8,000 which she uses to support her family.

She is applying for her first loan from KADET LTD, after being introduced by an existing KADET customer.  Hannah will use the loan to buy green vegetables and fruit for her business. 


With the anticipated profit from the business she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to distribute greens to nearby schools and hospitals.

loans.use: to buy green vegetables and fruit for her business

loans.name: Yorn

texts.en:
Yorn, 52, is married and resides with her husband and one school-aged child in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in growing agricultural crops for over twenty years, earning approximately USD 5 per day. Additionally, she sells groceries at home to generate extra income for the family. 

In order to improve the family’s economy, Yorn is requesting a loan of USD 300 to purchase more groceries to sell to make more profit for supporting the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and support her child to study higher.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell

loans.name: Basti

texts.en:
Basti is from the village of Mughanlo, East Georgia. She is 52 years old. Basti is a widow. She lives alone in her house. The only source of income for her is a small mixed-goods store in the village. She is the owner of the store and works as a saleslady as well. She purchases grocery products, as well as other goods, at wholesale markets in nearby towns and sells them in the store. Her total average monthly income from the store is 650 Laris. 

Basti requested credit to increase her stock in trade in the store. She will diversify the assortment of products and attract new customers. The sales of the store will increase and Basti will get more profit. She will use the increased profit to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to increase the stock in trade in her mixed store

loans.name: Eva

texts.en: Eva is a twenty-five-year-old married woman with two children living in Kasese, Uganda. Her personal goals are to educate her children, build a permanent house and self-education.She has been selling clothes for the last six years after starting with capital of eight hundred thousand UGX and now has over two million as her working capital. Her major hardship has been inadequate capital to purchase enough clothes, however, she has a goal of expanding her business to new areas. Eva needs a loan to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: 01.02.03 Đông Sơn Group

texts.en:
Bê is applying for a loan to purchase eels and rice to make processed food to sell. She operates a food stall/restaurant selling soup and rice rolls.

Bê is 48 years old and she is married with two children. Bê is the group leader of the 01.02.03 Đông Sơn solidarity group, which consists of four members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with her two dependents.

In 2010, Bê joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Bê has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Bê has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

Bê hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase eels and rice to make processed food to sell

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is a 43-year-old a business man. He is married to Charity, a farmer. They are blessed with three children. He has been running a cafe for the past four years with the monthly income of KES 10,000 which he uses to support his family.

He is applying for his first loan from KADET LTD after being introduced to KADET by a staff member. Peter will use the loan to buy green vegetables and a stock of sugar, rice and cooking oil. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to open a restaurant.

loans.use: To buy green vegetables and stock of sugar, rice and cooking oil.

loans.name: Jackline

texts.en:
Jackline is 46 years old, married to Amman, and is blessed with four children aged 30, 25, 20 and 18 years respectively. She sells firewood, a business she started 20 years ago and earns a monthly income of KES 40,000. 

She is requesting a loan of KES. 20,000 to purchase one tonne of firewood and the profit she earns from this will help her repay her loan. Her dream is to open another business. This is her first loan.

loans.use: To purchase one tonne of firewood for sale.

loans.name: Benedatta

texts.en: Benedatta is 30 years old, married with 3 children. She runs a cereals store to earn a living,she has been in the business for 5 years and describes her business environment as good because there is limited competition. Since she joined Faulu Kenya,s he has been able to grow her business and hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for KES 100,000 to buy beans, peas and maize to sell.

loans.use: To buy beans, peas and maize to sell.

loans.name: Srey Mom

texts.en: Srey Mom, 26, is married, and resides with her husband and two children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in growing rice for over ten years, earning approximately USD 3 per day. Additionally, her husband is an arc welder who constructs steel building and earns approximately USD 5 per day. In order to improve her family's living condition, Srey Mom is requesting a loan of USD 500 to purchase steel for her husband to use in his construction work. In the future, she would like to expand her husband’s business to be a steel construction foreman and send her children to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase steel for her husband to use in his construction work.

loans.name: Jose Jacinto

texts.es:
José es un padre de familia de 30años de edad, vive con su esposa y sus 3 hijos de los cuales son menores de edad, viven en un caserío rural de nombre “Cachinche” anexo del distrito de Mochumí perteneciente a la Provincia de Lambayeque a unos 15 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo aproximadamente. En la zona en la que viven cuentan con actividad económica principal la agricultura y la ganadería.


José se dedica de manera diaria a la crianza y posterior comercialización de animales  como ganado, ovinos y aves de corral como: patos, pavos, cuyes, entre otros, actividad a la que se ha dedicado siempre teniendo ya un aproximado de 3 años de experiencia en el negocio, negocio al que se ha dedicado desde muy pequeño junto a sus padres quienes le enseñaron a la compra/venta de los animales. Para lo que ha podido instalar en su propia casa espacios estratégicos para la crianza de los mismos, adicionalmente también se genera ingresos diarios trabajando como jornalero en los diferentes fundos cercanos a su caserío, la unión entre él y su esposa han hecho que emprendan en nuevos objetivos familiares y es que por eso trabajan diariamente para lograrlos y así mejorar su condición de vida.

José al tener ya sus objetivos claros y establecidos desea comprar alimentos balanceados los cuales servirán para el engorde de sus animales y a la vez la compra de más animales con la finalidad de aumentar sus ventas. José ha solicitado un crédito en Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 1500 Nuevos Soles los cuales ayudaran a generar mayores ingresos con los que podrán mejorar su calidad de vida y a la vez para pagar su crédito solicitado.
texts.en:
Jose is a 30 year-old father who lives with his wife and their 3 minor children.  They live in a rural settlement called "Cachinche" which is the Mochumi district of Lambayeque province, about 15 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.  In this area, most people make their living in agriculture and animal husbandry.

Jose tends daily to his business raising and selling livestock such as: cows and sheep; poultry, including ducks and turkeys; guinea pigs; and other animals.  Jose has always done this kind of work.  He has 3 years of experience with his business, but he has worked with livestock ever since he was very young alongside his parents, who taught him the business.  He has been able to set up special spaces on his property for raising these animals.  In addition, he also generates a daily income by working as a day laborer on the various farms near his settlement.  The union of Jose and his wife has meant that they have defined some new goals for their family, and it is for this reason that they both work each day in order to achieve them and in this way improve their living conditions. 

Jose, with clear and established goals, wants to buy animal feed to fatten his animals, and he also wants to buy more animals with the objective of increasing his sales.  Jose has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the sum of 1,500 Peruvian soles, which will help him to increase his income so that he can improve his quality of life, and at the same time, pay back the loan he is requesting.

loans.use: to buy livestock and animal feed

loans.name: Estela

texts.en:
This is Estela, 52, a resident of Pasay City, Philippines. She is a single parent and mother to her children. She manages her household while running her business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.

Estela sells clothing, footwear, undergarments, cosmetics and herbal products through popular direct-sales brands like Avon, Fuller Life, Natasha, Boardwalk, Marikina Shoe Exchange, and other direct-sales brands. A customer’s order is bought in cash by the dealer and then given to the customer with a one-month-to-pay credit. Dealer’s prices are lower than those in the catalogue, and the differences in price are the profits that dealers earn. Estela’s regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 5000 PHP in sales every week.

To help her continue operations, Estela is requesting a 30,000 PHP loan from CCT to buy merchandise for her customers. She expects a boost in her income as she expands her business. Estela hopes to be able to give her family a good future through her hard work.

All CCT community partners and clients are organized into fellowship groups of 15 to 30 partners apiece that meet on a weekly basis. Estela faithfully attends her group each week to share stories of each other’s work, build social capital, pay on their microfinance loans and study and gain strength from the Word of God.

loans.use: to pay for merchandise and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: Yolanda, de 65 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa. Además de ser amable y cordial, es separada del padre de su hijo. Vive en su casa propia, en compañía de su hija, su yerno y su nieto a los que quiere mucho. La actividad que realiza Yolanda es el servicio de alquiler de cuartos, para ello acondicionó en su propia casa varios ambientes y los puso en alquiler. Ahora tiene varios inquilinos a los que brinda un buen servicio. Tiene más de 04 años dedicándose a éste negocio, y hasta el momento cuanta con el apoyo de su hijo, quien le consigue más clientes. Le gusta su negocio pues le permite ocupada y productiva, y sola se encarga de los gastos del hogar. Sus planes es de ampliar y construir más cuartos de diversos tamaños, y tener disponibles para alquilarlos. Este será el préstamo número 12 con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en el mantenimiento de la bomba de agua de consuno humano, además de arreglos del piso y la puerta de ingreso para las habitaciones y así brindar un mejor servicio y seguridad a sus inquilinos.
texts.en:
Yolanda is 65, and a hard-working, determined woman, besides being warm and friendly. She is separated from her child's father. She lives in her own house with her daughter, her son-in-law, and her grandchild, and she loves them very much. Yolanda rents rooms. For this she has fitted up several rooms in her own house, and put them up for rent.

Now she has several tenants, to whom she provides a good service. She has been in this business for four years, and up to this point she has the help of her son, who gets her more customers. She likes her business,  as it allows her to be busy and productive; she alone is responsible for the household expenses. Her plan is to expand and construct more rooms of various sizes, and to have them available for rent.

This will be her 12th loan with the MFP institution, so she hopes for a small loan so that she can meet her objectives. With the amount of 1,000 nuevos soles applied for, she will invest in maintenance of the water pump for drinking water, and also repairs to the floor, and to the entry doors for the rooms, in order to provide better service and safety for her tenants.

loans.use: To fix the water pump, the floor, and doors to the rooms.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is a farmer in Litein in the southern end of the Rift Valley Province of Kenya. He lives with his five children, who are between the ages of three and fourteen. Four of his children are in school.

On his farm Paul grows tea and produces milk for the local market. He has requested a loan of 30,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy another dairy cow. He says expansion of his dairy will help him guarantee food for his family. He adds that with the growth of his business he will build a modern dairy before buying additional cows.

While Paul notes that access to financial support has been his main challenge, he says Juhudi Kilimo and its loans have come at the right time.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Americo

texts.es:
Américo, trabaja todo el día como chofer de su taxi  en la ciudad de La Paz.
El crédito lo requiere para el mantenimiento de su vehiculo y especialmente cambio de anillas ya que es el único ingreso para mantener a su familia.
Américo, es casado y tiene dos hijos con los cuales viven en una casa alquilada en la zona de Pasankeri de la ciudad de La Paz.
Es la segunda vez que trabaja con IMPRO y la segunda vez que trabaja junto a KIVA.
texts.en:
Américo works all day as a taxi driver in the city of La Paz. The loan he is requesting will be used to maintain his vehicle, especially the replacement of the rubber washers. This is the only source of income by which he is able to support his family. Américo is married and has two children. They live in a rented house in the District of Pasankeri in the city of La Paz.

This is the second time he has worked with IMPRO and with Kiva.

loans.use: to pay for maintenance of his taxi, including the replacement of the rubber washers.

loans.name: Llerme

texts.es: Llerme, de 46 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de ser amable y alegre con muchas de salir adelante. Convive con Elar con quien tiene un negocio familiar y es padre de sus hijos. Juntos viven en su propia casa, pero cada fin de semana sus hijos que ya son mayores e independientes la visitan. Las actividades que tiene Llerme es la venta de bebida gaseosa y golosinas. Asimismo tiene como negocio familiar un taller de tapicería donde su pareja se hace cargo del negocio. Ambos actividades lo realiza en su casa, de esa manera se ahorran gastos de alquiler de local. Tiene más de 2 años dedicándose a éstos trabajos con la colaboración de un ayudante en la tapicería, pagándole por cada trabajo terminado. Considera su negocio bastante rentable por las buenas ganancias que le deja, por tanto tiene planes de ampliar su negocio, e incursionar en otros como abrir un recreo turístico y ejecutarlo en un terreno propia, ,así logrará generarse más ingresos económicos. Este será el préstamo número 11 con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas que son responsables y muy solidarias. Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de materiales de tapicería para su taller, además con el saldo comprará bebidas gaseosas para tener stock disponible para la venta.
texts.en: Llerme, who is 46 years old, is a hard-working and determined woman, in addition to being kind and happy, with a great desire to advance. She lives with her partner, Elar, with whom she has a family business, and who is the father of her children. Together they live in their own house, but every weekend their children who are already adults and independent visit her. Llerme's business activities include the sale of soft drinks and candies. Similarly, she has as a family business an upholstery workshop, where her partner takes charge of the business. Both businesses are located in their house, in this way they save the expense of renting a shop. She has been working in these businesses for more than two years with the help of an assistant in the upholstery shop, who is paid for each job completed. She feels that her business is quite profitable because of the good earnings that it yields. For that reason she has plans to expand her business and enter into others, such as opening a tourist restaurant and doing this on their own land. Thus she will be able to generate more income. This will be her 11th loan with the MFP institution, so she hopes for your assistance to continue with her goals. In addition, she is happy to be part of her communal bank because all its members are people who are responsible and very united. With the 1500 PEN that she has applied for, she will invest in the purchase of upholstery supplies for her workshop. In addition, with the rest, she will buy soft drinks to have available stock for sale.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her upholstery workshop, in addition to more soft drinks to sell

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.en: Jacqueline has five children aged between three and thirteen years. She owns a boutique which she has been running for the last two years. She wants the loan to buy more items to sell in her boutique. She plans to use the profits for reinvesting in the business.

loans.use: To buy more boutique items for sale

loans.name: 01.030.3 Đông Sơn Group

texts.en:
Phương is 39 years old and married with 2 children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with 2 dependents. She has a retail business selling dry food. Phương has been involved in this business for 7 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital. Phương is applying for a loan to purchase dry food, beer and other goods to resell. 

Phương is the group leader of the 01.03.03 Đông Sơn solidarity group, which consists of 4 members. In 2011, Phương joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Phương has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

With her business profit, Phương hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase dry food, beer, and other goods to resell

loans.name: Bunthorn

texts.en: Bunthorn, 58, is married and resides with her husband and four children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in growing agricultural crops and fattening up cattle for over twenty years, have an extensive experience and are successful in their career. They earn approximately USD 3 per day. All of their children are employed. They are security guards and garment workers. Due to the difficulty in traveling to work, Bunthorn is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase a motorbike for her children to commute to work. By doing so, her children would save some money on their transportation expense to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her agricultural business and rebuild her present house to make it much stronger.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for her children to commute to work

loans.name: Dominga

texts.es:
La joven Dominga sigue con sus ventas de cosmeticos, parte de las cuales las vende por catalogos y encargos, cuenta con el apoyo economico y moral de su esposo, quien trabaja como albañil, su hija cada dia creciendo.
Con este nuevo prestamo, podra poner ceramica a su sala, dando mejor higiene a su casa, protegiendo mas sus muebles, y mejor comodidad a su familia, en donde comprara: cemento bonx, ceramica, separadores y tinta.
Contenta por lograr las mejoras en corto plazo, gracias a los financiamientos obtenidos. En donde ha abierto puertas a su comercio y ahora a su vivienda.
texts.en:
The young woman Dominga continues with her cosmetic sales, part of which she sells by catalog and from orders. She relies on the financial and moral support of her husband who works as a bricklayer. Her daughter grows more every day.

With this new loan she will be able to put ceramic material in her living room, making the house more hygienic, protecting her furniture more, and giving more comfort to her family. She will buy: bonx cement, ceramic material, dividers, and dye.

She is happy to achieve these improvements in the short term and thankful for the funding she's obtained. Doors have opened for her business and are now opening for her home.

loans.use: to buy ceramic materials to put in her living room, giving her family more comfort and hygiene.

loans.name: Azamjon

texts.ru: Азамчон проживает в районе Дж. Руми. Ему 33 года. Он женат. у него четверо детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам он занимается растениеводством. В этой области он восемь лет. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений и топлива, чтобы запастись для посева весеннего урожая.
texts.en: Azamchon lives in the J. Rumy region. He is 33 years old, married, and has four children. His wife is a housewife. He himself grows crops. He has been doing this for 8 years. He is taking out a loan to buy fertilizer and fuel, stocking up for planting of the spring crops.

loans.use: purchase fertilizer and fuel

loans.name: Angela Mercedes

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Mujeres Organizadas. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Angela, tiene 37 años de edad, está casada y fruto de esta relación tiene tres hijos de 17, 15 y 13 años, los tres estudian  en colegio. El marido tiene una fábrica de adoquines y también es albañil.
 
Ella es licenciada en Ciencias  De La Educación y se desempeña como maestra en una escuela de la localidad, pero para ayudar a su esposo ha solicitado este crédito para que él lo utilice en su negocio el cual se dedica a la elaboración y venta de adoquines(material utilizado para la construcción de calles y aceras), él trabaja de lunes sábado desde las 8h00 hasta las 17h00 en la fabricación y venta de los adoquines, vende tanto a personas particulares como también a las instituciones públicas que necesitan de ese material.  Ella en las tardes le ayuda más que todo en lo que es venta y contabilidad de la pequeña empresa. Él trabaja con dos personas a los que  les paga un sueldo semanal, lleva más de 10 años con este negocio y le va muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar cemento, arena y otros materiales necesarios para la fabricación de los adoquines. Lleva más de 7 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la forma como se trabaja en el banco.
 
Su sueño es que el negocio crezca cada día más.
texts.en:
The members of the Communal Bank of Organized Women meet every fifteen days in the Rocafuerte canton. This place is known for its delicious sweets, which the local people make, and which are well-known throughout the country.

In this place we meet Angela, who is 37 years old and married with three children from this union, ages 13, 15, and 17 years. All three are studying in high school. Her husband has a cobbling factory and is a bricklayer. 

Angela got a degree in educational science and works as a teacher in a nearby school, but to help her husband she has asked for the loan so he can use it in his business. He will put it towards the creation and sale of pavement (material used for the construction of streets and sidewalks.) He works from Monday to Saturday from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. making and selling pavement. He sells to individual people as well as to public institutions that need this material. In the afternoons, she helps him more than anything doing sales and accounting for the small business. She works with two people who he pays a weekly salary. He has had this business for more than 10 years and it is going very well for him.

This loan is for the purchase of cement, sand, and other materials necessary for the production of pavement. She has been a part of the Communal Bank for more than 7 years and she likes it because of the way the bank works.

Her dream is that the business will grow more every day.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and other materials to make pavement

loans.name: Alice

texts.en: Alice is 39 years old, married with two children. She sells men's and women's suits to earn a living. She has been in the business for 5 years and has employed one person. She also runs a salon to earn extra income. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to save her income and hopes to expand her business in the future. She has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy men's and women's suits for sale.

loans.use: To buy men's and women's suits for sale

loans.name: Hope

texts.en: Hope is a 43-year-old widowed lady with three children living in Kasese, Uganda. Her family goal is to educate her children up to the university level. She has been selling clothes for the last eleven years after starting with capital of five hundred thousand and now has over three millions shillings as her working capital. Her major hardships are price fluctuations and inflation. However, she has a vision of expanding her business to other areas. Hope needs a loan to buy clothes for resale.

loans.use: to buy clothes for resale.

loans.name: Zulema

texts.es:
Zulema, de 63 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de ser amable y solidaria. Está separada del padre de su hija. Vive en su propia casa en compañía de su hija de 27 años de edad.
La actividad que realiza Zulema es la venta de comidas como desayunos y almuerzo, contando con un restaurante ubicado en su propia casa, donde tiene varias mesas y sillas para la comodidad de sus clientes, que son atendidos de manera amable y cordial, ganándose de esa manera su preferencia. Pero durante el fin de semana venden parrillada de pollos que son muy requeridos por su buena sazón. Tiene más de 20 años dedicándose a éste negocio, y hasta el momento su hija es quien más la ayuda, atendiendo a los clientes. Le gusta su negocio pues le genera un ingreso económico constante que le sirve para pagar los gastos de su hogar, además de poder estar en la comodidad de su hogar. Considera rentable su negocio por las buenas ganancias que le deja, por tanto tiene planes de continuar en el negocio buscando hacerlo crecer. Este será el préstamo número 16 con la institución MFP, por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado, comenta sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal pues lo considera un grupo unido y solidario. Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de los ingredientes necesarios para la preparación de comidas, como: arroz, azúcar, aceites y otros, buscando conseguir precios más bajos por sus compras en volumen.
texts.en:
Zulema, who is 63 years old, is a hard-working and determined woman, in addition to being kind and supportive. She is separated from the father of her daughter. She lives in her own house with her daughter, who is 27.

Zulema's business is the sale of food such as breakfasts and lunches. She has a restaurant located in her own house, where she has a number of tables and chairs for the comfort of her customers, who are waited on in a kind and cordial manner, which earns their loyalty. But during the weekend she sells grilled chicken, which is in great demand because of its good flavor. She has been working in this business for more than 20 years, and up to now her daughter has been the one who helps her, waiting on the customers. She likes her business since it generates a constant income that allows her to pay her household expenses, in addition to being able to be in the comfort of her home. She considers her business profitable because of the good earnings that it gives her, so she has plans to continue with the business and seek to make it grow. 

This will be her 16th loan from the MFP institution, so she hopes for your assistance so that she can finalize her plans. On the other hand, she comments that she feel comfortable in her communal bank because she considers it to be a united and supportive group. With the 1500 PEN that she has applied for, she will invest in the purchase of the ingredients needed for the preparation of food, such as rice, sugar, oils, and other items, seeking to obtain lower prices by making her purchases in volume.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, and oils

loans.name: Carlos Roberto

texts.es:
Carlos en un padre de familia de 41 años de edad, vive con su esposa y con sus 2 hijos, su casa en la que actualmente viven está ubicada en  el  Caserío rural  “Guaraguaos Bajo Lote 80”, Distrito de Tambogrande, distrito que pertenece a la provincia a de Piura la cual esta ubicada a unas 3 horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo. Cliente vive en la parte rural  de este distrito el cual poco esta progresando por lo que por ahora solo cuenta con servicio básico de energía eléctrica.


Carlos se dedica de manera diaria a la crianza y posterior comercialización de animales  como ganado, ovinos y aves de corral como: patos, pavos, cuyes, entre otros, actividad a la que se ha dedicado siempre teniendo ya un aproximado de 5 años de experiencia en el negocio, negocio al que se ha dedicado desde muy pequeño junto a sus padres. Para lo que ha podido instalar en su propia casa espacios estratégicos para la crianza de los mismos, adicionalmente también se genera ingresos diarios trabajando como jornalero en los diferentes fundos cercanos a su caserío, y al cuidado de sus plantaciones de mango que tiene por cosechar ya en una has que de su propiedad.

Carlos al tener ya sus objetivos claros y establecidos desea comprar alimentos balanceados los cuales servirán para el engorde de sus animales y a la vez la compra fertilizantes para mejorar su producción. Carlos ha solicitado un crédito en Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 2000 Nuevos Soles los cuales ayudaran a generar mayores ingresos con los que podrán mejorar su calidad de vida y a la vez para pagar su crédito solicitado.

Gozan de muy buena relación con vecinos del caserío donde viven debido a que son personas de buen carácter.
texts.en:
Carlos is 41 years-old and the male head of household. He lives with his wife and their two children. The house in which they currently live is located in the very small, rural village Guaraguaos Bajo Lote 80 in the district of Tambogrande. This district belongs to the province of Piura which is located some three hours from the city of Chiclayo. He lives in a rural part of this district in which little is progressing and now he only can rely on basic electric service.

Carlos makes his daily living raising and later selling animals like cattle and sheep, and fowl like ducks, turkey, and guinea pigs, among others. He's always been making a living in this area and already has approximately five years of experience in business. He's been doing this since he was very little with his parents. He has been able to install strategic spaces in his home for the raising of those same ones. Additionally he also makes money working daily as a day laborer on different large farms near his small village and by taking care of the mango plantations that he has to harvest on his property.
